course_description: Students will continue to develop skills in Chinese by reading, discussing, and writing about topics in contemporary China. They will practice expressing their ideas in Chinese and will developan enriched understanding of traditions in Chinese culture  and society. For non-heritage students only.
sections: Class Nbr: 2219, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: TTh 10-11:15a, Instructor: C. Wang, Status: Open
